item.title: Why Password Managers Are Both More Convenient and Secure
item.description: I recently read a post on Reddit that says coming up with their customized password system/scheme is sufficient. An example system is this: If you used the last three letters of a website in reverse and add math, every website is easy. For example: Reddit -> Tid12*12=144 Yahoo -> Ooh12*12=144 This post is a response to the Reddit post. In my view, a password manager offers higher security, convenience, and ease of management.
